translations: 获得，得到；学到，习得；患上（疾病）；逐渐具有，开始学会

sentences.sentence: He was the mastermind behind the plan to acquire the explosives.
sentences.translation: 他是获取炸药计划的幕后操纵者。

sentences.sentence: One will never be able to understand why these political issues can acquire such force.
sentences.translation: 人们将永远不会明白为什么这些政治问题能获得如此的影响力。

sentences.sentence: People must acquire this skill somewhere.
sentences.translation: 人们必须从某个地方获得这种技能。
